sections.heading: Common Verb Pairs
sections.content:
Japanese has many transitive-intransitive verb pairs that express related actions. Learning these pairs together helps you understand the relationship between causing something to happen and something happening by itself.

Pattern: Transitive (他動詞) - someone does it Intransitive (自動詞) - it happens 開ける (tr.) - open something 開く (intr.) - something opens Learn as pairs Understand relationship

children.heading: 開ける ⟷ 開く
children.content:
開ける (akeru) - transitive "open (something)" ドアを開ける "open the door" 窓を開ける "open the window" 本を開ける "open a book" Someone opens it

開く (aku) - intransitive "(something) opens" ドアが開く "door opens" 窓が開く "window opens" 花が開く "flower opens" It opens by itself

children.heading: 閉める ⟷ 閉まる
children.content:
閉める (shimeru) - transitive "close (something)" ドアを閉める "close door" 窓を閉める "close window" 目を閉める "close eyes" Someone closes it

閉まる (shimaru) - intransitive "(something) closes" ドアが閉まる "door closes" 店が閉まる "store closes" 目が閉まる "eyes close" It closes by itself

children.heading: つける ⟷ つく
children.content:
つける (tsukeru) - transitive "turn on, attach" 電気をつける "turn on light" テレビをつける "turn on TV" ボタンをつける "attach button" Someone turns it on/attaches

つく (tsuku) - intransitive "(something) turns on, attaches" 電気がつく "light turns on" 火がつく "fire catches" ボタンがつく "button is attached" It turns on/attaches

children.heading: 消す ⟷ 消える
children.content:
消す (kesu) - transitive "turn off, erase" 電気を消す "turn off light" テレビを消す "turn off TV" 字を消す "erase letters" Someone turns it off/erases

消える (kieru) - intransitive "(something) goes out, disappears" 電気が消える "light goes out" 火が消える "fire goes out" 姿が消える "figure disappears" It goes out/disappears

children.heading: 始める ⟷ 始まる
children.content:
始める (hajimeru) - transitive "start (something)" 仕事を始める "start work" 授業を始める "start class" 話を始める "start talking" Someone starts it

始まる (hajimaru) - intransitive "(something) starts" 仕事が始まる "work starts" 授業が始まる "class starts" 映画が始まる "movie starts" It starts

children.heading: 終える ⟷ 終わる
children.content:
終える (oeru) - transitive "finish (something)" 仕事を終える "finish work" 話を終える "finish talking" Someone finishes it Less common than 終わる

終わる (owaru) - intransitive "(something) ends" 仕事が終わる "work ends" 授業が終わる "class ends" 映画が終わる "movie ends" It ends Very common

children.heading: 止める ⟷ 止まる
children.content:
止める (tomeru) - transitive "stop (something)" 車を止める "stop car" 時計を止める "stop clock" 出血を止める "stop bleeding" Someone stops it

止まる (tomaru) - intransitive "(something) stops" 車が止まる "car stops" 時計が止まる "clock stops" 雨が止まる "rain stops" It stops

children.heading: 見つける ⟷ 見つかる
children.content:
見つける (mitsukeru) - transitive "find (something)" 鍵を見つける "find key" 答えを見つける "find answer" 間違いを見つける "find mistake" Someone finds it

見つかる (mitsukaru) - intransitive "(something) is found" 鍵が見つかる "key is found" 答えが見つかる "answer is found" 犯人が見つかる "criminal is found" It is found

children.heading: なくす ⟷ なくなる
children.content:
なくす (nakusu) - transitive "lose (something)" 財布をなくす "lose wallet" 時間をなくす "lose time" Someone loses it

なくなる (nakunaru) - intransitive "(something) disappears, runs out" お金がなくなる "money runs out" 痛みがなくなる "pain goes away" 人がなくなる "person dies" It disappears/is gone

children.heading: 壊す ⟷ 壊れる
children.content:
壊す (kowasu) - transitive "break (something)" おもちゃを壊す "break toy" 機械を壊す "break machine" Someone breaks it

壊れる (kowareru) - intransitive "(something) breaks" おもちゃが壊れる "toy breaks" 機械が壊れる "machine breaks" It breaks

children.heading: 直す ⟷ 直る
children.content:
直す (naosu) - transitive "fix (something)" 時計を直す "fix clock" 間違いを直す "fix mistake" Someone fixes it

直る (naoru) - intransitive "(something) gets fixed" 時計が直る "clock gets fixed" 病気が直る "illness heals" It gets fixed

children.heading: 出す ⟷ 出る
children.content:
出す (dasu) - transitive "take out, send out" 手紙を出す "send letter" ゴミを出す "take out trash" 声を出す "let out voice" Someone puts out/sends

出る (deru) - intransitive "(something) comes out, leaves" 芽が出る "sprout comes out" 血が出る "blood comes out" 人が出る "person leaves" It comes out/leaves

children.heading: 入れる ⟷ 入る
children.content:
入れる (ireru) - transitive "put in" お金を入れる "put in money" コーヒーを入れる "make coffee" 名前を入れる "input name" Someone puts in

入る (hairu) - intransitive "(something/someone) enters" 部屋に入る "enter room" 大学に入る "enter university" 水が入る "water gets in" It/someone enters

children.heading: 変える ⟷ 変わる
children.content:
変える (kaeru) - transitive "change (something)" 予定を変える "change plans" 考えを変える "change opinion" Someone changes it

変わる (kawaru) - intransitive "(something) changes" 天気が変わる "weather changes" 気持ちが変わる "feelings change" It changes

children.heading: 増やす ⟷ 増える
children.content:
増やす (fuyasu) - transitive "increase (something)" 人数を増やす "increase number of people" お金を増やす "increase money" Someone increases it

増える (fueru) - intransitive "(something) increases" 人口が増える "population increases" 体重が増える "weight increases" It increases

children.heading: 減らす ⟷ 減る
children.content:
減らす (herasu) - transitive "decrease (something)" 支出を減らす "decrease spending" 体重を減らす "lose weight" Someone decreases it

減る (heru) - intransitive "(something) decreases" 人口が減る "population decreases" お金が減る "money decreases" It decreases

children.heading: つなげる ⟷ つながる
children.content:
つなげる (tsunageru) - transitive "connect (something)" 線をつなげる "connect lines" 手をつなげる "hold hands" Someone connects

つながる (tsunagaru) - intransitive "(something) connects" 電話がつながる "call goes through" インターネットにつながる "connects to internet" It connects

children.heading: かける ⟷ かかる
children.content:
かける (kakeru) - transitive "hang, put on" 絵をかける "hang picture" 鍵をかける "lock" 電話をかける "make phone call" Someone hangs/puts Multiple meanings

かかる (kakaru) - intransitive "(something) hangs, is on" 絵がかかる "picture hangs" 鍵がかかる "is locked" 時間がかかる "takes time" It hangs/is on Multiple meanings

children.heading: 上げる ⟷ 上がる
children.content:
上げる (ageru) - transitive "raise (something)" 手を上げる "raise hand" 値段を上げる "raise price" Someone raises it

上がる (agaru) - intransitive "(something) rises" 温度が上がる "temperature rises" 成績が上がる "grades go up" It rises

children.heading: 下げる ⟷ 下がる
children.content:
下げる (sageru) - transitive "lower (something)" 頭を下げる "lower head (bow)" 値段を下げる "lower price" Someone lowers it

下がる (sagaru) - intransitive "(something) lowers" 温度が下がる "temperature drops" 成績が下がる "grades drop" It lowers

sections.heading: Common Mistakes
sections.content: ❌ Mixing up the pairs ✗ ドアを開く (should be 開ける) ✗ 電気がつける (should be つく) ✓ Learn pairs together Transitive uses を Intransitive uses が ❌ Using wrong particle ✗ ドアが開ける ✓ Match particle to verb type ✓ ドアを開ける ✓ ドアが開く Practice with both Understand the relationship
